sql.content: UPDATE TProcess SET nextProcessID = ':previous.nextProcessID' ,nextActivityID = ':previous.nextActivityID' ,nextActivityCode = ':previous.nextActivityCode' ,nextActivityName = ':previous.nextActivityName' ,operateTime = ':previous.operateTime.fullMilli' ,operateTimeLen = :previous.operateTimeLen ,operateTypeID = ':previous.operateTypeID' ,operateType = ':previous.operateType' ,operateUserID = ':previous.operateUserID' ,operateUser = ':previous.operateUser' ,operateOrgID = ':previous.operateOrgID' ,operateOrg = ':previous.operateOrg' WHERE processID = ':previous.processID'

sql.content: SELECT A.processID ,A.workID ,A.serviceDataID ,A.splitProcessID ,A.processNo ,A.currentActivityID ,A.currentActivityCode ,A.currentActivityName ,A.previousProcessID ,A.previousActivityID ,A.previousActivityCode ,A.previousActivityName ,A.nextProcessID ,A.nextActivityID ,A.nextActivityCode ,A.nextActivityName ,A.createrID ,A.creater ,A.createOrgID ,A.createOrg ,A.createTime ,A.limitUserID ,A.limitOrgID ,A.limitTime ,A.operateTime ,A.operateTimeLen ,A.operateTypeID ,A.operateType ,A.operateUserID ,A.operateUser ,A.operateOrgID ,A.operateOrg ,A.operateFiles ,A.operateDatas ,A.infoComment FROM TProcess A <[ WHERE A.workID = ':workID' ]> <[ WHERE A.serviceDataID = ':serviceDataID' ]> ORDER BY A.operateTime DESC ,A.createTime DESC

INSERT INTO TProcess_History ( processID ,workID ,serviceDataID ,splitProcessID ,processNo ,currentActivityID ,currentActivityCode ,currentActivityName ,previousProcessID ,previousActivityID ,previousActivityCode ,previousActivityName ,nextProcessID ,nextActivityID ,nextActivityCode ,nextActivityName ,createrID ,creater ,createOrgID ,createOrg ,createTime ,limitUserID ,limitOrgID ,limitTime ,operateTime ,operateTimeLen ,operateTypeID ,operateType ,operateUserID ,operateUser ,operateOrgID ,operateOrg ,operateFiles ,operateDatas ,infoComment ) SELECT A.processID ,A.workID ,A.serviceDataID ,A.splitProcessID ,A.processNo ,A.currentActivityID ,A.currentActivityCode ,A.currentActivityName ,A.previousProcessID ,A.previousActivityID ,A.previousActivityCode ,A.previousActivityName ,A.nextProcessID ,A.nextActivityID ,A.nextActivityCode ,A.nextActivityName ,A.createrID ,A.creater ,A.createOrgID ,A.createOrg ,A.createTime ,A.limitUserID ,A.limitOrgID ,A.limitTime ,A.operateTime ,A.operateTimeLen ,A.operateTypeID ,A.operateType ,A.operateUserID ,A.operateUser ,A.operateOrgID ,A.operateOrg ,A.operateFiles ,A.operateDatas ,A.infoComment FROM TProcess A <[ WHERE A.serviceDataID = ':serviceDataID' ]> <[ WHERE A.workID = ':workID' ]>
DELETE TProcess <[ WHERE serviceDataID = ':serviceDataID' ]> <[ WHERE workID = ':workID' ]>
DELETE FROM TProcess <[ WHERE serviceDataID = ':serviceDataID' ]> <[ WHERE workID = ':workID' ]>
SELECT DISTINCT A.workID FROM TProcess A WHERE A.operateUserID = ':userID' UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT A.workID FROM TProcess_History A WHERE A.operateUserID = ':userID'
SELECT DISTINCT A.serviceDataID FROM TProcess A WHERE A.operateUserID = ':userID' UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT A.serviceDataID FROM TProcess_History A WHERE A.operateUserID = ':userID'
